com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.parser.lr

Class LROneParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.parser.lr.LROneParser

  • public class LROneParser
extends java.lang.Object

    CLR(1) parser implementation.

    Every algorithm has been derived from [A. Pettorossi "Techniques for Searching, Parsing and Matching (3th edition)", alg. 5.4.1]

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Giacomo Marciani
    See Also:
    CYKParsingSession

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static boolean parse(Grammar grammar,
            java.lang.String word)

        Checks if the specified word can be parsed by the specified grammar.

        The algorithm has been derived from [A. Pettorossi "Techniques for Searching, Parsing and Matching (3th edition)", alg. 5.4.1]

        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar to parse with.
        word - the word to parse.
        Returns:
        true if the specified word can be parsed by the specified grammar; false, otherwise.

      • parseWithSession

        public static LROneParsingSession parseWithSession(Grammar grammar,
                                   java.lang.String word)

        Checks if the specified word can be parsed by the specified grammar.

        The algorithm has been derived from [A. Pettorossi "Techniques for Searching, Parsing and Matching (3th edition)", alg. 5.4.1]

        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar to parse with.
        word - the word to parse.
        Returns:
        the LR(1) parsing session for the specified grammar and word.

      • getRecognitionMatrix

        public static LROneMatrix getRecognitionMatrix(Grammar grammar)

        Generates the LR(1) recognition matrix derived from the specified grammar.

        The algorithm has been derived from [A. Pettorossi "Techniques for Searching, Parsing and Matching (3th edition)", alg. 5.4.1]

        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar.
        Returns:
        the LR(1) recognition matrix derived from the specified grammar.

      • isLROneGrammar

        public static boolean isLROneGrammar(Grammar grammar)

        Checks if the specified grammar is a LR(1) grammar.

        The algorithm has been derived from [A. Pettorossi "Techniques for Searching, Parsing and Matching (3th edition)", rem. 5.4.4]

        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar.
        Returns:
        true if the specified grammar is a LR(1) grammar.
